description: All fields needed to build one structured row for a single patient.

attributes.name: sex
attributes.description: Map male→'m', female→'f' if stated. Use exact text indicators: girl/woman/female→'f', boy/man/male→'m'

attributes.name: age_of_onset_years
attributes.description: Age at symptom onset in years. Convert months to decimal years (e.g., 5 months → 0.42). Use earliest age if multiple onsets described.

attributes.name: age_at_diagnosis_years
attributes.description: Age at diagnosis in years if different from onset

attributes.name: last_seen_age_years
attributes.description: Age at last follow-up in years

attributes.name: alive_flag
attributes.description: 0=alive, 1=deceased. Only set to 1 if death is explicitly mentioned.

attributes.name: mutations
attributes.description: Array of genetic mutations found in this patient

attributes.name: phenotypes
attributes.description: Array of clinical phenotypes observed in this patient

attributes.name: treatments
attributes.description: Array of treatments and interventions for this patient

few_shot_examples.extraction_text: Patient 1 was a 4-month-old female with Leigh syndrome. She had SLC19A3 c.1276_1278delTAC (p.Val426del) mutation. She presented with encephalopathy and was treated with thiamine and biotin with improvement. She is alive at last follow-up.
